about_the_game:
The My Mud Game system has many preset Mud games, which are not very good reference examples for players who want to create their own Mud.
In order to facilitate players to create their own Mud, I concentrated and integrated the important functions provided by My Mud Game into this package, which is free for those who have purchased the main program.
In addition to a very simplified Mud, this DLC is expected to add teaching files made by Mud in the future to facilitate its use as a reference during development.
detailed_description:
The My Mud Game system has many preset Mud games, which are not very good reference examples for players who want to create their own Mud.
In order to facilitate players to create their own Mud, I concentrated and integrated the important functions provided by My Mud Game into this package, which is free for those who have purchased the main program.
In addition to a very simplified Mud, this DLC is expected to add teaching files made by Mud in the future to facilitate its use as a reference during development.
name: My Mud Game - Mini Mud and Documents

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The simplest Mud example is convenient for players to develop their own Mud reference.
